qpNCA 0.0.0

Reference

All functions

calc.ctmax()

Calculates Cmax, Tmax from raw data for each PK curve (define using group_by)

calc.par()

Calculates AUCs, tlast, clast.obs for each PK curve (define using group_by)

calc.par.th()

Calculates PK parameters that need lambda_z

correct.conc()

Corrects missing concentration at critical time points (e.g, predose, TAU, start and end of user selected AUC interval)

correct.time()

Corrects concentrations at critical, but deviating time points (e.g, predose, TAU, start and end of user selected AUC interval), and adds missing records at these critical time points.

est.thalf()

Calculates lambda_z and thalf for each PK curve (defined using group_by)

interpol()

Interpolate concentrations

lag.lead()

Estimate lagging and leading time points and concentrations for each time point

nca.conc.table()

Format raw individual concentrations table for report

nca.format.table()

Format NCA parameters table

nca.summary.table()

Summarize NCA parameters table

nca.sumstat.conc()

Summarizes a vector concentration measurements for output to a report

nca.sumstat.params()

Summarizes a vector of PK Parameters for output to a report For parameter values that have 0's reported, e.g. AUC when all concentratinos are 0, assign NC

ncaTabulate()

Format the table NCA parameters table

tab.corr()

Tabulates what records were added, time deviations and concentration imputations were applied, for each subject

trap()

Trapezoid function

Contents

  • All functions
